bill.title: Mortgage Foreclosures; Affirmation Required When Action Commenced
bill.description: Requires that an affirmation be filed with the court at the time a mortgage foreclosure action is commenced.

history.action: Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to CPC, JUD, referral sheet 7
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Monday, 02-03-14 2:10PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-05-14.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-05-14 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Kawakami, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Evans, Ito, C. Lee, Nakashima, Oshiro, Tsuji, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cachola, Har, Yamane.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 258-14), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Belatti, Cachola, Takai excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-25-14 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Kawakami, Tsuji, Wooley, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Ito, C. Lee, Nakashima.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 697-14), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Creagan, Har, Thielen, Woodson excused (4). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 193).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to CPN, JDL.
The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-11-14 9:30AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Nishihara, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2855) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 03-25-14 10:00AM in conference room 016.
The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 03-28-14 10:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Galuteria; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara, Solomon, Slom.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3331) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 04-08-14.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Galuteria, Hee). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 503).
Transmitted to Governor.
